output.sentences: All of the people participating in the Jogging For Charity even lined up.
They began by jogging over a bridge.
We lined up white and red cups in preperation to serve plenty of drinks.
There were women, and people of other nations included.
The marathon was flowing as well as possible, and another year of the event continues.
